value.name: ACCU_DIM
value.description: Dimension on which averaging is performed by the Cameleon

value.name: ACQUISITION_MATRIX_DIMENSION_1D
value.description: Info: Size of the initial dataset (raw data) in first dimension

value.name: ACQUISITION_MATRIX_DIMENSION_2D
value.description: Info: Size of the initial dataset (raw data) in second dimension

value.name: ACQUISITION_MATRIX_DIMENSION_3D
value.description: Info: Size of the initial dataset (raw data) in third dimension

value.name: ACQUISITION_MATRIX_DIMENSION_4D
value.description: Info: Size of the initial dataset (raw data) in fourth dimension

value.name: ACQUISITION_MODE
value.description: Info: ACQUISITION_MODE and DATA_REPRESENTATION are filled according to the phase modulation chosen

value.name: ACQUISITION_TIME_PER_SCAN
value.description: Info: Time during which the signal is sampled by the ADC

value.name: ADJUST_WINDOW
value.description: Enable to get the frequency from "Base Frequency 1" and not from instrument

value.name: BASE_FREQ_1
value.description: Info: Carrier wave frequency of the first channel

value.name: BASE_FREQ_2
value.description: Info: Carrier wave frequency of the second channel

value.name: BASE_FREQ_3
value.description: Info: Carrier wave frequency of the third channel

value.name: BASE_FREQ_4
value.description: Info: Carrier wave frequency of the fourth channel

value.name: DATA_REPRESENTATION
value.description: Info: ACQUISITION_MODE and DATA_REPRESENTATION are filled according to the phase modulation chosen

value.name: DELAY_ECHO
value.description: Enable to define the "Time RF-ADC" by adding an Extra Time to the minimal time achievable between RF and ADC

value.name: DELAY_ECHO_TIME
value.description: Extra time added before the signal reception (input if "Add Extra Time RF-ADC" checked)

value.name: DIGITAL_FILTER_REMOVED
value.description: Enable to activate the data shift

value.name: DIGITAL_FILTER_SHIFT
value.description: Data shift due to the digital filter

value.name: DUMMY_SCAN
value.description: Number of dummy cycles used to reach steady-state

value.name: ECHO_TIME
value.description: Dead time between RF and ADC (input if "Add Extra Time RF-ADC" unchecked)

value.name: FIELD_OF_VIEW
value.description: Field of view

value.name: FLIP_ANGLE
value.description: Excitation flip angle

value.name: GRADIENT_AMP_SPOILER
value.description: Spoiler gradient amplitude

value.name: GRADIENT_ENABLE_SPOILER
value.description: Enable gradient spoiler

value.name: GRADIENT_REFOC_TIME
value.description: Top time of the slice refocusing gradient

value.name: GRADIENT_RISE_TIME
value.description: Rise time of gradients

value.name: GRADIENT_SPOILER_TIME
value.description: Top time of the slice refocusing gradient

value.name: IMAGE_ORIENTATION_SUBJECT
value.description: Direction cosines of the first row and the first column with respect to the subject

value.name: INTERMEDIATE_FREQUENCY
value.description: Info: Frequency from the Hardware used for the signal demodulation (ADC optimal frequency)

value.name: LAST_PUT
value.description: LAST_PUT.description

value.name: MAGNETIC_FIELD_STRENGTH
value.description: Info: Magnetic field stength from the hardware

value.name: MANUFACTURER
value.description: Info: Manufacturer

value.name: MIN_RISE_TIME_FACTOR
value.description: Safety parameter applied on maximum gradient slew rate. Fastest is 100%

value.name: MODALITY
value.description: Info: Acquisition modality

value.name: MODEL_NAME
value.description: Info: Model name

value.name: MULTI_PLANAR_EXCITATION
value.description: Enable to do slice excitation

value.name: NUCLEUS_1
value.description: The nucleus used for the first sequence channel

value.name: NUCLEUS_2
value.description: The nucleus used for the second sequence channel

value.name: NUCLEUS_3
value.description: The nucleus used for the third sequence channel

value.name: NUCLEUS_4
value.description: The nucleus used for the fourth sequence channel

value.name: NUMBER_OF_AVERAGES
value.description: Number of averages/excitation

value.name: OBSERVED_FREQUENCY
value.description: Info: Frequency of the acquisition

value.name: OBSERVED_NUCLEUS
value.description: Info: Observed nucleus

value.name: OFFSET_FREQ_1
value.description: Frequency offset of the first channel

value.name: OFFSET_FREQ_2
value.description: Frequency offset of the second channel

value.name: OFFSET_FREQ_3
value.description: Frequency offset of the third channel

value.name: OFFSET_FREQ_4
value.description: Frequency offset of the fourth channel

value.name: OFF_CENTER_FIELD_OF_VIEW_1D
value.description: Info: Off-center distance in Readout Direction

value.name: OFF_CENTER_FIELD_OF_VIEW_2D
value.description: Info: Off-center distance in Phase Encoding Direction

value.name: OFF_CENTER_FIELD_OF_VIEW_3D
value.description: Info: Off-center distance in Slice Direction

value.name: OFF_CENTER_FIELD_OF_VIEW_EFF
value.description: Info: Off Center effective in 1D, 2D and 3D (read, phase, slice)

value.name: OFF_CENTER_FIELD_OF_VIEW_X
value.description: Off-center distance in the R/L direction

value.name: OFF_CENTER_FIELD_OF_VIEW_Y
value.description: Off-center distance in the A/P direction

value.name: OFF_CENTER_FIELD_OF_VIEW_Z
value.description: Off-center distance in the I/S direction

value.name: ORIENTATION
value.description: Field of view orientation

value.name: PAROPT_PARAM
value.description: Name of the current optimised parameter

value.name: PHASE_0
value.description: PHASE_0.description

value.name: PHASE_1
value.description: PHASE_1.description

value.name: PHASE_APPLIED
value.description: PHASE_APPLIED

value.name: PHASE_RESET
value.description: Enable the Phase reset at the beginning of each scan

value.name: PROBES
value.description: Name of probes used for the transmit and reception

value.name: RECEIVER_COUNT
value.description: Info: Number of reception channels

value.name: RECEIVER_GAIN
value.description: Receiver Gain

value.name: REPETITION_TIME
value.description: Repetition time

value.name: SEQUENCE_NAME
value.description: The name of the sequence

value.name: SEQUENCE_TIME
value.description: Info: Total acquisition time

value.name: SEQUENCE_VERSION
value.description: Info: Sequence version

value.name: SETUP_MODE
value.description: True during setup process / False for regular use for the sequence

value.name: SLICE_THICKNESS
value.description: Slice Thickness

value.name: SOFTWARE_VERSION
value.description: Info: Software version

value.name: SPECTRAL_WIDTH
value.description: Receiver bandwidth (SW, BW, bandwidth )

value.name: SPECTRAL_WIDTH_OPT
value.description: Use BW to calculate BW per pixel (Check) / Use BW per pixel to calculate BW (Uncheck)

value.name: SPECTRAL_WIDTH_PER_PIXEL
value.description: Bandwidth per point ( FID res)

value.name: STATION_NAME
value.description: Info: Station name

value.name: SUBJECT_POSITION
value.description: Subject position relative to the magnet

value.name: TRANSFORM_PLUGIN
value.description: Info: Transform the acquisition space to the k-space

value.name: TRIGGER_CHANEL
value.description: Choose the external trigger channels option (if available)

value.name: TRIGGER_EXTERNAL
value.description: Enable to synchronize the acquisition with external trigger

value.name: TRIGGER_TIME
value.description: Delays between trigger and acquisition start (Multiple values)

value.name: TX_AMP
value.description: Amplitude of the excitation RF pulse

value.name: TX_AMP_ATT_AUTO
value.description: Enable to automatically set attenuation and amplitude for the RF according to the calibration and the flip angle

value.name: TX_AMP_NUMBER
value.description: Number of TX amplitude increment steps to get a nutation curve

value.name: TX_AMP_START
value.description: Start value of TX amplitude ramp to get a nutation curve

value.name: TX_AMP_STEP
value.description: Value of the TX amplitude increment step to get a nutation curve

value.name: TX_AMP_VALUES
value.description: Info: Values of the TX amplitude sampling points of the nutation curve

value.name: TX_ATT
value.description: Emission RF pulse attenuation

value.name: TX_LENGTH
value.description: Emission RF pulse length

value.name: TX_LENGTH_NUMBER
value.description: Number of TX length increment steps to get a nutation curve

value.name: TX_LENGTH_START
value.description: Start value of TX length ramp to get a nutation curve

value.name: TX_LENGTH_STEP
value.description: Value of the TX length increment step to get a nutation curve

value.name: TX_LENGTH_VALUES
value.description: Info: Values of the TX length sampling points of the nutation curve

value.name: TX_NUTATION_AMP
value.description: Enable to acquire a nutation curve by varying the TX amplitude

value.name: TX_NUTATION_LENGTH
value.description: Enable to acquire a nutation curve by varying the TX length

value.name: TX_ROUTE
value.description: Info: Physical transmit channel

value.name: TX_SHAPE
value.description: Emission RF Pulse shape

value.name: USER_MATRIX_DIMENSION_1D
value.description: Number of points of the FID (user matrix dimension 1D)

value.name: USER_MATRIX_DIMENSION_2D
value.description: Number of repetitions (user matrix dimension 2D)

value.name: USER_MATRIX_DIMENSION_3D
value.description: Number of repetitions (user matrix dimension 3D)

value.name: USER_MATRIX_DIMENSION_4D
value.description: Info: Number of trigger delays (user maxtrix 4D)
